Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Truncate cone-shaped vase with wide mouth and rounded rim. The straight walls are flared and it has a stable base with ring-shaped foot. The paste is orangey in colour and the surface is covered with a coating of a reddish colour. It has a painted decoration based on horizontal bands of a dark red colour which are positioned at the top and bottom of the body.
